wikipedia_page.main:
Adam Hague (born 29 August 1997) is an English athlete specialising in the pole vault. He won gold medal at the 2015 European Junior Championships. In addition, he competed at the 2018 Commonwealth Games finishing fourth.
His personal bests in the event are 5.65 metres outdoors (Berlin 2018) and 5.65 metres indoors (Birmingham 2018).
